keys: Economía del hogar. Hoja de trabajo

    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4659</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Adapt a Risotto Recipe</string>
            <string language="es">Adaptación de una receta de arroz</string>
            <string language="ga">Oiriúnaigh Oideas Risotto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Passen Sie ein Risotto Rezept an</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Adaptez une recette de Risotto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adapte uma receita de Risotto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Adatti una ricetta di Risotto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσαρμόστε μια συνταγή Risotto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet requiring students to modify a recipe for chicken risotto in order to meet specific dietary needs.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que requiere que los estudiantes modifiquen una receta para arroz con pollo para que cubra unas necesidades dietéticas específicas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre ina gcaitheann daltaí oideas do risotto sicín a oiriúniú le go bhfeilfeadh sé go riachtanais diat áirithe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Home Economics</string>
            <string language="es">Economía del hogar. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Eacnamaíocht Bhaile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen, der Kursteilnehmer benötigt, ein Rezept 
für Huhn risotto zu ändern, um spezifische diätetische Bedürfnisse
zu erfüllen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau exigeant des étudiants de modifier une 
recette pour le risotto de poulet afin de satisfaire les besoins 
diététiques spécifiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha que requer estudantes modificar uma receita
para o risotto da galinha a fim encontrar-se com necessidades 
dietéticas específicas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro che richiede agli allievi di 
modificare una ricetta per il risotto del pollo per soddisfare le 
esigenze dietetiche specifiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας που απαιτεί τους σπουδαστές για να 
τροποποιήσει μια συνταγή για το risotto κοτόπουλου προκειμένου 
να ικανοποιηθούν οι συγκεκριμένες διαιτητικές ανάγκες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauswirtschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Économie ménagère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Economia Home</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Economia domestica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικονομικά "Οικιαών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
